HELLSPIRE
=============================================================================================
THIS MOD IS NOW ABANDONED AS IT WAS A PROJECT TO SEE THE EXTENT OF WHAT I COULD DO WITH THE CK. NOW I HAVE A LOT MORE MODDING EXPERIENCE AND KNOWLEDGE I AM CURRENTLY WORKING ON A NEW WORLDSPACE MOD FROM SCRATCH WHICH WILL BE MUCH BETTER THAN HELLSPIRE. IT WILL BE A NEW REALM OF OBLIVION: THE PIT OF SORROW.
=============================================================================================

NOTE: YOU WILL HAVE TO START HELLSPIRE MOD FROM THE BEGINNING WITH NO SAVE DATA FOR THIS MOD TO ACCESS THE NEW AREAS AND FINISH THE MOD COMPLETELY TO GAIN ACCESS TO THE MOVIE CUTSCENES.

This is my totally unique worldspace/quest mod I have been working on for some time now. It tells the story of a Fallen god who once served the Aedra as an angel of death but then grew to be evil and was cast down to the Infernal realm of Hellspire.

Explore the infernal realm of Hellspire, a hellish place that exists between the worlds. All manner of terrifying and demonic creatures inhabit the tormented landscape, but all bow to Azazel the fallen god. Do you have what it takes to beat Hellspire? Be warned all the creatures and bosses in Hellspire are tough. This won't be a walk in the park like defeating Alduin or Miraak. Recommended for high level characters.

Features

New hand built worldspace
Lots of challenging bosses and enemies
New npcs
1 Main Questline and 13 Side Quests
Unique Hellish climate
Own World Lore
3 New Spellbooks to find
Unique armor and weapons
Explore the ruined city of Tahr Volhkar, The Sea of Bone and the Desert of Flame

V4.1
Added new small worldspace The Void and The palace of Eternal Darkness (players will have to start Hellspire from the beginning to access the Palace of Eternal Darkness and The Void)

Added the Hellmouth

Added new spellbooks, powers and weapons
Added new monsters
Added 5 new quests (21 in total)
Retextured roads with custom texture

Rebalanced weapon damage values
Cluttered Exterior worldspace more

Fixed bug where Moloch's remains would fall through the floor
Fixed bug where main quest would not update after collecting the lust key
Fixed hook weapons animations

============================================================================================

Installation

Unrar, Copy and paste everything to the data folder, check Hellspire.esp and TheVoid.esm in Skyrim Data Files and your all set!

Requires Dawnguard
Mod cleaned with TES5Edit

To start the quest the player should talk with brodir in the strange house near whiterun(map marker visible on world map)

The enterance to Hellspire is near Ilfanias Deep ( map marker visible)
